about_the_game:
Welcome to QuickSwitch, a fast-paced 2D multiplayer shooter that takes intensity to a whole new level. Engage in fierce combat across various gamemodes such as :
- Free-For-All
- Team Deathmatch
- Capture the Flag
- Survival Arena

You can also build your QuickSwitch experience to your own liking with highly customisable lobbies.

Choose between a large range of skins, weapons combo, and lot of maps presenting different tactical challenges.

Showcase your skills with detailed player statistics, leaderboards and in-game profiles.

Join our vibrant and cozy community, pulsing with camaraderie, where legends like g0dak stand shoulder to shoulder with aspiring newcomers. Compete in high-stakes tournaments for glory and rewards.

Whether you‘re a seasoned competitor or a newbie seeking thrills, QuickSwitch promises an immersive and inclusive gaming experience that will keep you coming back for more.

name: QuickSwitch

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8192 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 5450
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Fast Multiplayer 2D shooter, focusing on skills and timing. Vast variety of gamemodes, maps, weapons, skins. Fight for your ranking and glory !
